name: The song of Nastaliq
description:
Siyah Mashq
This calligraphy practice sheet contains a number of words and diagonal letters that are used as a combination of top and bottom on the sheet. The common Persian Nasta'liq broken line is preferred to the more broken line. Known as black exercises, these sheets became fully linear as a means of practicing calligraphy while preserving paper. Over time, they became a collection that led to signatures and dates.
Letter (ر)
(ر) is the twelfth letter of the Persian alphabet. The calligraphy of this letter is like a bird. Therefore, in this work of art, I have combined one of the Persian letters (ر) with the shape of a bird, inspired by nature.
